name: Firing Squad DEMO
description:
Shoot yourself through the enemies, and try to survive and have fun in this (for now) unlimited life shooter.

Shoot your enemies, the red dudes, and don't kill your allies, green dudes. Overall, it's a shooter, it's not that hard to get.

Controlls:

WASD - movement
Shift - sprint
Left controll - crouch
Space - jump
V - throw grenade
F - call soldier
G - make them follow you or not

Gun customization:

Right click on the guns name to change emblems of it, under the guns name should be a skin selector, these both things on the demo only work with the Assault Rifle, not the shotgun (for now).

MacOS, Linux and Android versions coming soon!
